channel.title: API Proxy :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Warning The video adds an extra slash to the /auth route in the vite.config.js file when setting up a proxy. That slash should be removed. Connecting to our RESTful API Now that we have the basic structure of our application built and are becoming more familiar with both Vue and PrimeVue, letâ€™s work on connecting to our backend RESTful API application and see if we can retrieve some data from our database.
